text: 19:6 Akar Mogomem 1:6; 5:10Egh ia na baghavɨra itir gumazamizibara ikɨ, egh ofa gamir gumazibar mɨn ikɨ, Kantrin Igharazibar Gumazamiziba bagh abuir gumazimɨn ingangarim damuam. Egh ia bar guizbangɨra nan gumazamizibara ikɨva na baghvɨra ikiam.” Egha Ikiavɨra Itir God mɨgɨrɨgɨar kaba gumazamizibar anɨngasa Moses mɨgei.
